sense.def:
To undo something that is closed, tied, or held together
pomeni, da nekaj, kar je zaprto, zvezano ali speto, odpremo ali odvežemo, tako da lahko vzamemo ven tisto, kar je notri.

seg.quote: ...undoing a newspaper parcel tied with string.
He bent down and undid the laces of his shoes.

sense.def:
To undo something useful that has been done
pomeni, da preprečimo, da bi nekaj koristnega, kar je bilo narejeno, bilo učinkovito.

seg.quote: He appeared to be undoing all their patient work.
